name: Frontly
title: frontly.ai
payoff: Build custom apps with no code
shortDescription: Frontly allows users to create custom applications using a no-code platform, enhanced by AI capabilities. It is designed for non-technical users such as business analysts, project managers, and entrepreneurs. An example use case is a small business owner creating an internal tool to manage inventory and process orders without needing programming skills.
cons: Limited customization compared to coded solutions
Potential performance issues with complex apps
Dependence on platform updates and support

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Bubble
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers no-code development with a visual editor

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Adalo
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on mobile app development without code

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: AppGyver
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Provides extensive customization for no-code apps
